programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Fundraising Scams
programme.desc: Crimes exploiting online generosity are a growing trend. These real-life stories show people going to great lengths to con unsuspecting donors out of their money.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Discover Hub City’s mouthwatering bites, diverse culture and coziest corners.

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Citizen vs. Con
programme.desc: Sometimes the bad guys are busted by regular people! These stories showcase good Samaritans stopping suspects in their tracks.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A missing Milwaukee woman's family and her community push for answers about her disappearance. What authorities learn a week later sends shockwaves through the city.

programme.title: Heroes On Call
programme.sub-title: Heroes On Call: The Forgotten Story of America's First Paramedics
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Americans were dying at shocking rates due to inadequate emergency care. Enter Freedom House Ambulance Service: the first paramedics unit in the U.S., run and staffed by Black men and women. This is the origin story of EMS.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Mom Daughter Duo Drop Into the Wild
programme.desc: The mother-daughter dynamic duo of Cher and Sabria Delaine are best friends and do almost everything together except get out into nature. So Kinga meets up with ladies to mix things up and try to blend Cher’s island life with some southern comfort.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Ready To Settle Down
programme.desc: Luke is a Kansas City bachelor who is finally ready to settle down. He’s purging the dating apps and hoping to find the perfect match. He’ll meet three blind dates as they play pickleball, get their shuffleboard on and visit a llama farm.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Hunt for the Daytona Beach Serial Killer
programme.desc: A serial killer preys on women from a hardscrabble section of Daytona Beach, Florida. Detectives have boxes of DNA and ballistic evidence. They just don't have a suspect.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown: Thirsty at the Seaport
programme.desc: From cycling on a party boat to practicing yoga in the great outdoors, Rob discovers that Boston’s newest neighborhood is full of surprises.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Law & H2Order
programme.desc: Splish splash, will the would-be criminals take a bath? These wild stories wind up in bodies of water that you have to see to believe.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Consoling a Single Mom Who's Fallen on Hard Times
programme.desc: Recycled Percussion travels to Stillwater, Oklahoma to share some love with a single mom and her children who have fallen on hard times. Justin consoles the oldest daughter who recently moved in with her mom after living with her father for 10 years.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Sports teams would be nothing without their fans, who bring more than passion to the game. From the pros to the high schoolers, these stories show how being a fan can create a community.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Escaping the Single Life at 49
programme.desc: After being divorced for 15 years Angelina is looking for love in all the right places in Sacramento with three local bachelors. But she’s going to have her work cut out for her as she goes bowling, talks classic cars and completes an escape room.

programme.title: Restaurants on the Radar
programme.sub-title: Restaurant on the Radar: Street Food
programme.desc: Travel around the world without leaving the City Beautiful behind! Brendan samples street food from all over the globe: Laotian delicacies, a fresh spin on falafel, and so much more.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It!: Best Buds Become Culinary Competitors in Small Town Toss-Up
programme.desc: Long time chef friends Kisha Washington and Brian Hohl compete in this Smaltimore small plates challenge. Can these small town friends handle a big screen competition?

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Homebody Seeks New Heights
programme.desc: When it comes to nature, Maddie Carlin is a self-proclaimed Debbie Downer. Kinga is in Milwaukee to convince her to give nature another chance. They’re traveling across the state, looking for an adventure to inspire Maddie to get off the couch!

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.desc: Aphrodisiacs, costumes, neon things and more on two cheap dates in New Orleans.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Vanishing of a Promising Wisconsin Teen
programme.desc: In 1990, an 18-year-old driving across Wisconsin to a job conference never arrives. After her van and later her body are discovered, the mystery surrounding Berit Beck’s death persists for more than two decades. What happened in that van?

programme.title: Underdog Uprising
programme.desc: Every game day, fans pour into the stands to cheer on New Mexico's soccer team. But these are no ordinary supporters. From the Curse, to Sektor 114, to the Black Diamonds these fans are making New Mexico United.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Free Spirit : How Louisville is Blazing a New Bourbon Trail
programme.desc: Kate learns how to play a Germantown street game, gets up close and personal with handcrafted, hand-charred bourbon barrels, and learns to fall back in love with whiskey – and natural wine.

programme.title: Chronicle: Quip Town
programme.desc: (2024) An all-access look at the Aliquippa high school football team's journey to repeat as state champions, from training camp through the season, all while battling numerous obstacles.

programme.title: The Lost Children of Carlisle
programme.desc: A powerful look at the history of Native American boarding schools as told through the stories of tribal members and their surviving family members, who endured an educational system founded on the concept “Kill the Indian in him, and save the man.”

programme.title: One Pill Can Kill
programme.desc: Told through the voices of grieving parents, this documentary follows the real and lasting impact of the fentanyl crisis. Capturing the aftermath of sudden loss, the search for answers, and the transformation of grief into public advocacy.

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.desc: Maker Nation

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.desc: Makers, crafters and artists square off to create the most iconic art piece that best represents their city. From glass-blowers and chalk artists to metalsmiths and tattooers, see who Host Ashley Adams and the judges will crown the victor.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Making Time for Fun
programme.desc: Daniel Johnson juggles three jobs and is a single father to three kids. Kinga meets with Daniel in Pittsburgh, PA to help him ‘clock out’, reconnect with nature, and experience some quality “me time.”

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.desc: Each episode of this documentary series features incredible sports stories from iconic American cities. From gritty underdog victories to passionate unlikely match-ups, the series proves that sports are so much more than a pastime.

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.desc: Orlando expert, Brendan O'Connor, celebrates the people behind the scenes of the businesses that make Orlando a truly unique place. Join him as he rolls up his sleeves and receives hands on training while spending a day with them, On The Job.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: West By Orphan Train
programme.desc: A gripping documentary uncovering real stories of children loaded on trains, sent west, and presented “for the picking.” From 1854 to 1929, over 6,000 children landed in Iowa communities. Discover their emotional journeys and impact on the Midwest.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: Chronicle: Slice of the 'Burgh
programme.desc: (2023) An exploration into what makes Pittsburgh’s pizza scene so special, and the impact pizza shops have on their communities.

programme.title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.desc: In the summer of 1980, two men wheeled what looked like an IBM computer into a Lake Tahoe casino. The events that followed rocked the industry, baffled bomb technicians, and changed the lives of a criminal’s and a casino magnate’s family forever.

programme.title: Refugees Welcome: A Story of Immigration to America’s Heartland
programme.sub-title: Refugees Welcome: A Story of Immigration to America's Heartland
programme.desc: Refugees Welcome documents how one Governor’s brave decision to welcome refugees during the Vietnam War had far reaching repercussions not only for the country but, generations later, for the fate of his own family.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Miya Marcano Story
programme.desc: When homesick college student Miya Marcano books a flight to south Florida for the weekend, her family is thrilled. But when the plane lands, Miya is nowhere to be found.
